answerText: Future Tech technology [prompt on Future Technology because things have names][10] Future Tech is found in this series of Sid Meier games, whose fifth entry has an expansion called Gods and Kings. You play as a ruler of one of the namesake groups from the dawn of time until victory or defeat.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 14 - Finals 2 | 9 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: In the fourth installment of the series that it can be obtained in, it adds one health and one happiness, though in the other games it only increase your score. For 10 points each: [10] Name this advancement that can be endlessly researched when the science tree is maxed out. In the fourth and fifth installments, quotations from Dan Quayle and George W. Bush accompany its completion.
